name: 2nd World Congress on Gynecology & Obstetrics- 2022
content: We invite you to join the 2nd World Congress on Gynecology & Obstetrics which is going to be held on March 09-10, 2023 at Zurich, Switzerland that impacts the advancements and technology trends in Gynecology. The theme of the conference is â€œAssist the Future Endeavors in Gynecology and Obstetrics Care". Meeting deals with the current research developments in the field of Gynecology and also about the new treatment methods which are devised by scientists to treat in easier way. This meeting acts as a best platform for attendees to learn about the recent trends in Gynecology and development. Scope of Gynecology Forum 2023: It serves as a platform for, Gynecology and Obstetrics, Obstetricians, Gynecologic Oncology, Menstrual cycle and Ovulation, Paediatric and Adolescent Gynecology, Pregnancy and Perinatology Scientists, and Research Professors in the field of Gynecology.
